title: Police: 17 Schools in Fairfield, CT, Under Lockdown After 'Threat of Violence'
text:
Published By: ABC News: US - Today 
All 17 public schools in Fairfield, Connecticut, went into lockdown on Friday morning after an "unverifiable threat" of violence, according ...
